Vision to Reality. Lets Code.

Hey there! I'm Fabien

The world of code has fascinated me since I was just 7 years old. That's when I started tinkering with programming languages, and I haven't stopped exploring this exciting field ever since. Over the years, I've developed a passion for building beautiful and functional websites and applications.

Currently, I'm running my own freelance web development business from Nelson, New Zealand. As a full-stack developer, I enjoy working on both the front-end (what you see) and the back-end (what makes it work) of web applications.

SaaS Projects

I'm also working on some exciting SaaS projects on the side, bringing cool ideas to life that I believe can make a significant impact.

Looking for a Web Developer?

I'm always on the lookout for new and interesting projects to take on! Whether you have a simple website concept or a complex application in mind, I'd love to hear about it.

Let's Talk!
